welcome_message_body: Welcome to Topeka, the charming capital city of Kansas! Get ready to explore our rich history, vibrant arts scene, and beautiful outdoor attractions. Enjoy your time here and make the most of your visit!

restaurants.name: The Burger Stand At College Hill
restaurants.description: The Burger Stand At College Hill is a burger joint located in Topeka.

restaurants.name: Tortilla Jack's Mexican Restaurant
restaurants.description: Tortilla Jack's Mexican Restaurant is a mexican restaurant located in Topeka.
restaurants.address: 1618 SW Washburn Ave (at Byron), Topeka, KS 66604

restaurants.name: Margarita's Jalisco
restaurants.description: Margarita's Jalisco is a mexican restaurant located in Topeka.

restaurants.name: College Hill Pizza Pub
restaurants.description: College Hill Pizza Pub is a pizzeria located in Topeka.

restaurants.name: Hanover Pancake House
restaurants.description: Hanover Pancake House is a breakfast spot located in Topeka.
restaurants.address: 1034 S Kansas Ave (SE 11th Street & South Kansas Avenue), Topeka, KS 66612

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Forbes Field Airport is where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Forbes Field Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
